question: [File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/v2/state.rs] [Function: new()] [Hash collision attack] Can an attacker manipulate the dashmap_num_shards parameter at lines 127-132 to force all entries into a single shard, degrading DashMap performance to O(n) and causing validator slowdown?
